text.name: sys_description
text.text: Released in 2017, the Switch is always on sale. It is a hybrid console that can be used as a home console and portable device. Its wireless Joy-Con controllers, with buttons and directional analog sticks, motion sensing, and tactile feedback, can attach to both sides of the console to support handheld-style play. Nintendo opted to use a chipset Nvidia Tegra X1 with 4GB of ram and 32GB eMMC for storage. This LCD display offer 1280x720 and docked 480p/720p/1080p via HDMI. Its catalog offers cult games like Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.
